validationRules.numValue: Required - final number to count up to (as string)
validationRules.numGap: Required - increment step for each count (smaller = smoother, larger = faster)
validationRules.timeDelay: Required - milliseconds between each increment (smaller = faster animation)
validationRules.symbol: Optional suffix after number (%, +, K, M, B, etc.)
validationRules.symbolPos: 'before' or 'after' - position of symbol relative to number
validationRules.iconStore: Required when iconType='icon' - FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fas fa-check-circle')
validationRules.svgIcon.url: Required when iconType='svg' - SVG file URL
validationRules.linkURL.url: Optional - wraps counter in link tag for clickable stats
validationRules.ariaLabel: Recommended when using linkURL - accessible description for link
validationRules.titleTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable title typography
validationRules.digitTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable digit typography

warnings: numValue, startValue, numGap, timeDelay must all be STRING numbers (e.g., '100' not 100)
Animation speed = (numValue - startValue) / numGap * timeDelay milliseconds - adjust numGap and timeDelay for desired speed
Large numGap values (500+) create jumpy animations - use smaller values (1-10) for smooth counting
Small timeDelay values (1-5ms) create very fast animations - use 10-50ms for noticeable count-up effect
numeration:'commas' automatically adds thousands separators - don't manually add commas to numValue
symbol appears AFTER number by default (symbolPos:'after') - use 'before' for prefix-style symbols
preSymbol is separate from symbol - can use both (e.g., preSymbol:'$' and symbol:'+' for '$100+')
iconType determines which icon attribute is used: 'icon' uses iconStore, 'img' uses imagestore, 'svg' uses svgIcon
style-2 layout displays icon on LEFT, number/title on RIGHT - different from style-1 vertical stack
linkURL makes entire counter clickable - ensure ariaLabel is set for accessibility
normalBG.bgType='gradient' requires full bgGradient object - use 'color' for simple backgrounds
openTypography:1 required before setting titleTypo/digitTypo - otherwise typography won't apply
digitHvrColor and titleHvrColor only work when linkURL is set (hover state on clickable counters)
Animation triggers on scroll when counter enters viewport - place strategically for best impact
Multiple counters on same page all animate simultaneously when visible - consider staggered placement
Very large numbers (1,000,000+) should use K/M/B notation with smaller numValue for faster animation
commonMistakes: Using number instead of string for numValue/startValue/numGap/timeDelay - breaks animation
Setting numGap too high relative to numValue - animation completes in one jump
Setting timeDelay too low (0 or 1) - animation too fast to see or causes performance issues
Not enabling openTypography:1 before customizing fonts - typography settings ignored
Using both symbol and preSymbol without understanding the difference - symbol is suffix, preSymbol is prefix
Forgetting to set iconStore when iconType='icon' - icon won't display
Using imagestore.url when iconType='icon' - attribute ignored unless iconType='img'
Not setting normalBG.openBg:1 when trying to add background - background won't show
Expecting hover colors without linkURL - hover states only work on clickable counters
Using commas in numValue when numeration='commas' - commas added automatically, manual commas break parsing
Setting both style1Align and style2Align - only one applies based on style
Not testing animation speed - too fast/slow ruins user experience
Using K/M notation with actual value (e.g., numValue:'15000' with symbol:'K') - displays '15000K' instead of '15K'
Forgetting ariaLabel on linked counters - accessibility issue
Setting startValue higher than numValue - animation counts backwards unexpectedly
bestPractices: **Animation Speed:** Use numGap:1-10 with timeDelay:10-50ms for smooth, noticeable counting
**Large Numbers:** For 1M+, use K/M notation with smaller numValue (e.g., numValue:'15' symbol:'K' instead of numValue:'15000')
**Number Format:** Use numeration:'commas' for readability on numbers > 1,000
**Symbol Choice:** % for percentages, + for 'more than', K/M/B for large numbers, $ for currency
**Typography Scale:** Digits 48-72px, title 14-20px for balanced hierarchy
**Color Contrast:** Ensure digitNmlColor contrasts with background (4.5:1 ratio WCAG AA)
**Icon Selection:** Choose icons that represent the metric (users for customers, trophy for awards, dollar for revenue)
**Animation Timing:** Aim for 2-4 second total animation - fast enough to engage, slow enough to be noticeable
**Responsive Sizing:** Scale down fontSize on mobile (md:56px → xs:36px) for better fit
**Link Usage:** Only use linkURL when counter leads to relevant detail page - don't link just for interactivity
**Accessibility:** Set descriptive ariaLabel on linked counters ('View our 500 completed projects' not just 'Projects')
**Background Colors:** Use subtle backgrounds (#f5f5f5) for separation, bold gradients for emphasis
**Hover Effects:** If using linkURL, add hover colors to indicate clickability
**Placement:** Place counters above the fold for immediate animation on page load
**Multiple Counters:** Use consistent styling across counter grid (same fontSize, iconType, colors)
**Symbol Positioning:** Use symbolPos:'before' for currency symbols ($100), 'after' for units (100%)
**Start Value:** Use startValue:'0' for impact, non-zero values for partial progress indicators
**Icon Type Consistency:** Use 'icon' (FontAwesome) for consistency, 'img' for custom branding
**Grid Layouts:** Place 3-4 counters in tp-row + tp-column for stat showcase sections

accessibilityNotes: **Color Contrast:** Ensure digitNmlColor and titleNmlColor have 4.5:1 contrast ratio with background for WCAG AA
**Aria Labels:** When using linkURL, set descriptive ariaLabel ('View our 500 completed projects' not just 'Projects')
**Semantic Meaning:** Counter provides visual animation but screen readers see static final value
**Link Context:** If counter is clickable (linkURL), ensure link purpose is clear from title/ariaLabel alone
**Keyboard Navigation:** Linked counters must be keyboard focusable with visible focus state
**Motion Sensitivity:** Counter animation may trigger vestibular disorders - consider prefers-reduced-motion media query
**Number Readability:** Use numeration:'commas' for large numbers to aid comprehension
**Icon Alt Text:** Font Awesome icons are decorative - ensure title provides context, not just icon
**Multiple Counters:** Each counter should have unique title/ariaLabel - avoid generic labels
**Animation Duration:** Keep animations under 5 seconds to avoid frustrating users waiting for final value
performanceConsiderations: **JavaScript Intervals:** Counter uses setInterval during animation - minimal performance impact for 2-4 second duration
**Multiple Counters:** Limit to 4-6 counters per page section to avoid excessive simultaneous animations
**Animation Trigger:** Counters animate on scroll when entering viewport - reduces initial page load impact
**Large numGap:** Using larger numGap (100+) reduces total iterations, improving performance for large numbers
**Image Icons:** If using iconType:'img', optimize images (compress, use WebP) for faster load
**SVG Icons:** iconType:'svg' provides scalable icons with minimal file size
**Background Gradients:** CSS gradients are performant - no image assets needed
**Responsive Breakpoints:** Test counter animation on mobile - slower devices may lag with very fast animations (timeDelay < 5)
**Lazy Loading:** Place counters below fold strategically - animation triggers on scroll for better initial page performance
**Font Loading:** Ensure custom fonts load before counter appears to avoid FOUT (Flash of Unstyled Text)
integrationPatterns: **About Page Stats Grid:** Place 4 counters in tp-row with tp-column (3-3-3-3 or 4-4-4 layout) for company metrics
**Hero Section Stats:** Use 2-3 counters below hero tp-heading for key business metrics
**Testimonial Section:** Combine counter (client satisfaction %) with tp-testimonials for credibility
**Service Pages:** Add counter above tp-pricing-table ('15K+ satisfied customers') for social proof
**Team Section:** Place counter (years experience) in tp-team-member-list cards
**Sidebar Widgets:** Use style-2 compact counters in sidebar with icon on left
**Footer Statistics:** Add counter row above footer content for achievement showcase
**Portfolio Pages:** Counter for projects completed near tp-image gallery
**Product Pages:** Download/user counters near tp-button CTA for social proof
**Dashboard Pages:** Multiple counters for KPI overview with tp-container layout
